00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 // Prototypes
00013 void *send_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00014 void send_free(t_send *x);
00015 void send_assist(t_send *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);
00016 void send_bang(t_send *x);
00017 void send_int(t_send *x, long value);
00018 void send_float(t_send *x, double value);
00019 void send_list(t_send *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00020 
00021 // Globals
00022 static t_class          *s_send_class;                                  // Required: Global pointer for our class
00023 static t_object         *s_receivemaster_object = NULL; // An instance of the jcom.receivemaster class
00024 
00025 
00026 /************************************************************************************/
00027 // Main() Function
00028 
00029 int main(void)
00030 {
00031         long attrflags = 0;
00032         t_class *c;
00033         t_object *attr;
00034         
00035         jamoma_init();
00036 
00037         // Define our class
00038         c = class_new("jcom.send", (method)send_new, (method)0L, (short)sizeof(t_send), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00039 
00040         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_send, obex));
00041 
00042         // Make methods accessible for our class:
00043         class_addmethod(c, (method)send_bang,                           "bang",                 0L);
00044         class_addmethod(c, (method)send_int,                            "int",                  A_LONG, 0L);
00045         class_addmethod(c, (method)send_float,                          "float",                A_FLOAT, 0L);
00046         class_addmethod(c, (method)send_list,                           "list",                 A_GIMME, 0L);
00047         class_addmethod(c, (method)send_list,                           "anything",             A_GIMME, 0L);
00048     class_addmethod(c, (method)send_assist,                             "assist",               A_CANT, 0L);
00049     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,     "dumpout",              A_CANT,0);  
00050     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,    "quickref",     A_CANT, 0);
00051         
00052         // ATTRIBUTE: name
00053         attr = attr_offset_new("name", _sym_symbol, attrflags,
00054                 (method)0, (method)0, calcoffset(t_send, attr_name));
00055         class_addattr(c, attr);
00056         
00057         // Finalize our class
00058         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00059         s_send_class = c;
00060         
00061         return 0;
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 /************************************************************************************/
00066 // Object Life
00067 
00068 // Create
00069 void *send_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00070 {
00071         long    attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);               // support normal arguments
00072         t_send  *x = (t_send *)object_alloc(s_send_class);
00073         if(x){
00074                 object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x, NULL));
00075 
00076                 if(attrstart > 0)
00077                         x->attr_name = atom_getsym(argv);
00078                 else
00079                         x->attr_name = gensym("jcom.send no arg specified");
00080                         
00081                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);                                       // handle attribute args
00082                 
00083                 if(!s_receivemaster_object)
00084                         s_receivemaster_object = (t_object *)object_new(CLASS_NOBOX, gensym("jcom.receivemaster"));
00085         }
00086         return x;
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 /************************************************************************************/
00091 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00092 
00093 // Method for Assistance Messages
00094 void send_assist(t_send *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00095 {
00096         if(msg==1)                      // Inlets
00097                 strcpy(dst, "input to dispatch to jcom.receive objects");
00098         else if(msg==2)         // Outlets
00099                 strcpy(dst, "dumpout");
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 void send_bang(t_send *x)
00104 {
00105         send_list(x, _sym_bang, 0, NULL);
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 void send_int(t_send *x, long value)
00110 {
00111         t_atom a;
00112         
00113         atom_setlong(&a, value);
00114         send_list(x, _sym_int, 1, &a);
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 void send_float(t_send *x, double value)
00119 {
00120         t_atom a;
00121         
00122         atom_setfloat(&a, value);
00123         send_list(x, _sym_float, 1, &a);
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 void send_list(t_send *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00128 {
00129         object_method(s_receivemaster_object, ps_dispatch, x->attr_name, msg, argc, argv);
00130 }
